name: Sky Saviors
description:
MOUSE LEFT CLICK = JUMP || MOUSE RIGHT CLICK = SHOOT||SPACE = PAUSE

This is my first own creation. I learned a lot from this since I had no experience in creating games, pixel art and Unity. I hope you have fun.

The world is being destroyed by their own inhabitants. The human race is collecting every possible resources from the soil of planet Earth. 

Now they must face the wrath of a species coming from above.

They want to save planet Earth and in order to do that they will exterminate all living beings.
